metadata.title: CVE-2023-2019 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's netdevsim device driver, within thescheduling of events. This issue results from the improper management of areference count. This may allow an attacker to create a denial of servicecondition on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
